title: please I'm desperate
body:
I need a support. I'm ADC main, spammed a lot of Jinx recently and wanted to try out more Adc's. 
IF you are a main support and have a larger champion pool (always prefer peeling support (NOT LUX!!!!) or thresh) {{champion:117}} {{champion:43}}{{champion:37}} {{champion:497}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:44}} 

you should be/have:
- Gold+
- at least 20 years old cause I'm a granny or at least I feel like one lol
- Support main ONLY !!!!
- good headset + discord 
ADD ME :** and lets climb together !!!!!! {{sticker:sg-kiko}}

pls... :'(

replies.body:

English in a German LoL-Forum not the best Idea Dude. Better You try an English-Forum.
